name: Lost in the Snow
description:
In this game you will control a fox, searching for his friend deer in the blizzard. You need him to get back home. But be careful, every second of the day counts!

★★★ Thrilling Challenge ★★★
Find your path home and see what happens!

★★★ Achievements ★★★
The game uses Google Play Achievements so you can unlock them all!

★★★ FREE ★★★
The game is completely free!

Please leave all your suggestions below. We would really appreciate your feedback!
